name: Duel picto battles, pics game
description:
New fast pace picture trivia game!!
Find and click more pictures than your opponent to win the game.
Receive puzzle pieces and unlock smart, fun witty posters.
All pics close up games are the same – but Duel PIcto Battles takes it to the next level, without cheats or guessing the character. Just simple, straight up logic games that fill up your time.
Each level has 30 to 4 pics 1 word. Watch the word and click all the relevant pics faster than your opponent to win the duel.
Different levels have different dupes – ice, bars, oil and more. Just stay focus – even when the close up pics are out of focus!. Just use your logic to click the right picture.
Duel Picto battles picture trivia moves fast like true or false games, so you get the best of both worlds. If the pictures follow the word/category than it’s true or false if they don’t. Think fast , react fast, play fast and win fast!
